com.dotmarketing.portlets.chains

Class ChainControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dotmarketing.portlets.chains.ChainControl

  • public final class ChainControl
extends java.lang.Object
    This Data object contains the environment of parameters, request, attributes set by the chain executor and the subsequent execution of links This data class gets passed to every link in the chain and used by those links to pass and retrieve data in and out the execution environment
    Author:
    davidtorresv

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String CHAIN 
      static java.lang.String CONTINUE_ON_EXCEPTION
      If this property is set to true in case of an exception thrown by one of the links of the chain, the execution of the whole chain will continue This property could be set as a "true"/"false" string value or a true/false boolean value the chain executor will handle both cases By default the chain executor will treat it as false so it will not continue in case of an exception This is a volatile property that will get reset to false after the execution the link that sets it to true
      static java.lang.String CONTINUE_ON_FAILURE
      If this property is set to true even if the link returns failure(false) the execution of the whole chain will continue This property could be set as a "true"/"false" string value or a true/false boolean value the chain executor will handle both cases By default the chain executor will treat it as false so it will not continue in case of an exception This is a volatile property that will get reset to false after the execution the link that sets it to true
      static java.lang.String CURRENT_STATE 
      static java.lang.String FAILURE_VALUE 
      static java.lang.String REQUEST 
      static java.lang.String RESTART_TRANS
      If this property is set to true, the chain transaction will be committed and restarted in case the link finished on success This property could be set as a "true"/"false" string value or a true/false boolean value the chain executor will handle both cases This is a volatile property that will get reset to false after the execution the link that sets it to true
      static java.lang.String ROLLBACK_ON_ERROR
      Control property that could be set on the If this property is set to true in a case of a failure the whole chain transaction will be roll-backed This property could be set as a "true"/"false" string value or a true/false boolean value the chain executor will handle both cases By default the chain executor will treat it as true so it will roll-back the transaction is case of a failure, either if the link returns false or the link throws an exception This is a volatile property that will get reset to true after the execution the link that sets it to true
      static java.lang.String ROLLBACK_ONLY
      Control property that could be set on the If this property is set to true at the end of the execution of the link the whole chain transaction will be roll-backed and restarted This property could be set as a "true"/"false" string value or a true/false boolean value the chain executor will handle both cases By default the chain executor will treat it as false so it will not roll-back the transaction at the end of the execution of the link This is a volatile property that will get reset to false after the execution the link that sets it to true
      static java.lang.String SESSION 
      static java.lang.String SUCCESS_VALUE
      This variables let the links know and control the return values that the chain is going to return in case of success or failure

      Returns true if the current link is set to continue even if throws an exception

      Returns true if the current link is set to continue even if throws an exception

      Returns true if the current link is set to continue even if throws an exception

      protected void setChain(Chain chain) 
      protected void setChainProperties(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> chainProperties) 
      void setContinueOnException()
      Will set the continue on exception property on the chain context that will force the execution of the rest of the chain even if the current executed link failed throwing an exception
      void setContinueOnFailure()
      Will set the continue on failure property on the chain context that will force the execution of the rest of the chain even if the current executed link failed returning false
      protected void setCurrentState(ChainState state) 
      protected void setExecutionResult(java.lang.String executionResult) 
      java.lang.String setFailureValue(java.lang.String failureValue)
      Returns the property that hold the success URL

      void setRollbackOnly()
      Will set the roll-back flag that will cause a transaction roll-back at the end of the execution of the link
      protected void setSession(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session) 
      java.lang.String setSuccessValue(java.lang.String successValue)
      Returns the property that hold the success URL
      void setToNoRollbackOnError()
      Will disable the roll-back on error flag, that will cause that in case of an error the while chain transaction will not be roll-backed
      void setToRestartTransaction()
      Will disable the roll-back on error flag, that will cause that in case of an error the while chain transaction will not be roll-backed

      • FAILURE_VALUE

        public static final java.lang.String FAILURE_VALUE
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ROLLBACK_ON_ERROR

        public static final java.lang.String ROLLBACK_ON_ERROR
        Control property that could be set on the If this property is set to true in a case of a failure the whole chain transaction will be roll-backed This property could be set as a "true"/"false" string value or a true/false boolean value the chain executor will handle both cases By default the chain executor will treat it as true so it will roll-back the transaction is case of a failure, either if the link returns false or the link throws an exception This is a volatile property that will get reset to true after the execution the link that sets it to true
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ROLLBACK_ONLY

        public static final java.lang.String ROLLBACK_ONLY
        Control property that could be set on the If this property is set to true at the end of the execution of the link the whole chain transaction will be roll-backed and restarted This property could be set as a "true"/"false" string value or a true/false boolean value the chain executor will handle both cases By default the chain executor will treat it as false so it will not roll-back the transaction at the end of the execution of the link This is a volatile property that will get reset to false after the execution the link that sets it to true
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • RESTART_TRANS

        public static final java.lang.String RESTART_TRANS
        If this property is set to true, the chain transaction will be committed and restarted in case the link finished on success This property could be set as a "true"/"false" string value or a true/false boolean value the chain executor will handle both cases This is a volatile property that will get reset to false after the execution the link that sets it to true
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CONTINUE_ON_EXCEPTION

        public static final java.lang.String CONTINUE_ON_EXCEPTION
        If this property is set to true in case of an exception thrown by one of the links of the chain, the execution of the whole chain will continue This property could be set as a "true"/"false" string value or a true/false boolean value the chain executor will handle both cases By default the chain executor will treat it as false so it will not continue in case of an exception This is a volatile property that will get reset to false after the execution the link that sets it to true
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CONTINUE_ON_FAILURE

        public static final java.lang.String CONTINUE_ON_FAILURE
        If this property is set to true even if the link returns failure(false) the execution of the whole chain will continue This property could be set as a "true"/"false" string value or a true/false boolean value the chain executor will handle both cases By default the chain executor will treat it as false so it will not continue in case of an exception This is a volatile property that will get reset to false after the execution the link that sets it to true
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
